name: kafka-zookeeper
description: Apache ZooKeeper is a centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and providing group services. All of these kinds of services are used in some form or another by distributed applications
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 4000 MB MEM | 5000 MB Disk

Versions: Apache ZooKeeper 3.4.14
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache ZooKeeper service is being installed.

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/kafka-zookeeper/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache ZooKeeper service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.11 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/kafka-zookeeper/uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
